meanings.definition: A type of dumpling filled with a savory or sweet filling, typically made with unleavened dough.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed eating the pierogi filled with cheese and potatoes.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother makes delicious pierogi for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The pierogi danced in the boiling water, ready to be eaten.
meanings.sent4: Her love for pierogi was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked pierogi filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: We ordered two plates of pierogi for the party.
meanings.sent2: The pierogi were served with a side of sour cream.
meanings.sent3: The pierogi piled up high on the table, tempting everyone.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pierogi added a festive touch to the meal.
